name: Imgbb
description: rakib-imgbb-api is an API designed to facilitate image uploads to ImgBB. It allows users to upload images directly and receive a public URL for easy sharing. This API simplifies the bot to make a url from the image. made by Rakib Adil.

name: API 2
description: API 2 offers a wide range of features that will take your app to the next level.

name: API 3
description: With API 3, you can automate tasks and enhance your web applications.
